td.content: s:f aged 42 ys presents with 2 years history of decrease in appetite. patient also reports increased frequency of critical pain radiating from the back to the torso, critical back pain, Body Aches. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 69.8 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, CBC WBC=5000 /mm3,Hgb=12 mg/dL,Hct=40 %, Basic Metabolic Panel creatinine=1 mg/dL,BUN=20 mg/dL,Ca=9 mg/dL, PSA PSA=500 ng/mL, MRI spine shows a mass lession compressing the spinal cord in mid thoracic spine, Back = midthoracic spine tenderness to palpation and percussion a:Low Back Pain p:administered Dexamethasone - 10 MG/ML IV bolus, performed CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, PSA, MRI spine, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Value.Value: CBC , Basic Metabolic Panel , PSA , MRI spine ,

content2.Value: CBC , Basic Metabolic Panel , PSA , MRI spine ,

td.content: s:a white female aged 43 years presents with 10 days history of worsening critical back pain, decrease in appetite and critical pain radiating from the back to the torso. o:Height 177 cm, Weight 72.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, CBC WBC=5000 /mm3,Hgb=12 mg/dL,Hct=40 %, Basic Metabolic Panel creatinine=1 mg/dL,BUN=20 mg/dL,Ca=9 mg/dL, PSA PSA=500 ng/mL, MRI spine shows a mass lession compressing the spinal cord in mid thoracic spine, Extremities = 2+ popliteal, dorsalis pedis and posterior tibial pulses B/L, hips normal, nontender ROM B/L a:Low Back Pain p:administered Dexamethasone - 10 MG/ML IV bolus, performed CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, PSA, MRI spine, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Value.Value: CBC , Basic Metabolic Panel , PSA , MRI spine ,
